author: David Gilbert, Anne Torpey
title: China's Been Flooding Facebook With Shady Ads Blaming Trump for the Coronavirus Crisis
description: The ads have been running for months, but Facebook's systems didn't catch them and flag them as political until now.
content:
Chinese state media has been flooding Facebook and Instagram with shady political ads praising Beijing and bashing racist President Trump as part of a wider campaign to rewrite its part in the global coronavirus pandemic.
 The undisclosed political ads, from… [+3975 chars]
